Function.Description: The deg function converts a value specified in radians to degrees.

Brief.Overview: The deg function converts a value specified in radians to degrees.
Brief.Usage: The deg function is used to convert a value expressed in radians to degrees.

Argument.Name: num
Argument.Note: Any value specified in radians or a formula, cell or cell reference that evaluates to a value in radians which you want to convert to degrees.

Syntax.Return: The value of num is converted to degrees.
